docs.hotel_address: 102 Soi Wora Phong (สามเสน6) ถนนวิสุทธิกษัตริย์ แขวงบ้านพานถม, 10200 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Rich8 Hostel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Situated in Bangkok and with Khao San Road reachable within 1.1.2 miles, Rich8 Hostel features express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. The property is set 1.2 miles from Bangkok National Museum, 2 km from Wat Saket and 1.3 miles from Temple of the Emerald Buddha. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.
All rooms at the hostel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen and a dining area. Rooms are equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms at Rich8 Hostel have a balcony. All units will provide guests with an oven.
A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.
Dusit Palace is 1.4 miles from Rich8 Hostel, while Grand Palace is 1.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 15.5 miles from the hostel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

You're eligible for a Genius discount at Ekanek Hostel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located in Bangkok, Ekanek Hostel is a 1-minute walk from Patpong and provides facilities like terrace and shared lounge. Ideally situated in the Bang Rak district, this hostel offers a bar. Snake Farm-Queen Saovabha Memorial Institute is 1,000 feet from the hostel.
At the hostel, rooms have a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Ekanek Hostel also provide guests with a city view.
There is a pantry area at the hostel where guests will find a microwave and a refrigerator.
The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day.
MBK Shopping Mall is 1 miles from the accommodation, while Amarin Plaza is 1.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 14.3 miles from the property.

You're eligible for a Genius discount at Phobphan Hostel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Boasting a shared lounge, terrace and views of city, Phobphan Hostel is situated in Bangkok, 1.8 miles from Arab Street. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel has family rooms.
The hostel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a microwave, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a shared bathroom with a shower. At Phobphan Hostel the rooms come with bed linen and towels.
Asian and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.
Central Embassy is 2.2 miles from Phobphan Hostel, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 2.3 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 14.3 miles from the hostel.

Kloem Hostel in Bangkok provides adults-only accommodation with a shared lounge, a garden and barbecue facilities. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Every room comes with a balcony.
